metadataAttributes.Title: Mathematics for Machine Learning Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Mathematics for Machine Learning. Learn about the prerequisite mathematics for applications in data science and machine learning
metadataAttributes.Skills: Eigenvalues And Eigenvectors, Principal Component Analysis (PCA), Multivariable Calculus, Linear Algebra, Basis (Linear Algebra), Transformation Matrix, Linear Regression, Vector Calculus, Gradient Descent, Dimensionality Reduction, Python Programming,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: David Dye ,Samuel J. Cooper ,A. Freddie Page ,Marc Peter Deisenroth ,
